subject: Career
title: Reciprocity: The Give-to-Get Principle
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Reciprocity: The Give-to-Get Principle.

hook.text: The recruiter gives you extra PTO. Now you feel obligated to accept the lower base. That's reciprocity.

buildup.text: Reciprocity is a deep social instinct: when someone gives, we feel compelled to give back.

discovery.text: In negotiation, small concessions from the employer create pressure to concede on bigger items.

twist.text: You can use it too: 'I'm flexible on start date if we can meet on compensation.'

climax.text: Strategic concessions on low-priority items buy goodwill for high-priority ones.

punchline.text: Give what costs you little. Get what matters most.

quiz.question: How does reciprocity affect salary negotiation?
options: Small concessions create pressure to concede on bigger items
